# Pall of Twilight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Pattern Spells|pattern]]) \[[[Darkness Spells|darkness]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 113

*A creeping pall of darkness covers the area like running ink, muting sound and color alike.*

This spell reduces illumination in the area to shadowy; these shadows are mental as well as physical. All creatures in the area take a â€“10 penalty on [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] and [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks. A successful Will save negates these penalties, but not the effect of the darkness.
